name: yivcolor
description: Display color previews in any file type

yivcolor.enable.markdownDescription: Enable or disable color previews globally for all supported file types

yivcolor.appearance.previewSize.description: Size of the color preview square in pixels
yivcolor.appearance.previewSize.markdownDescription: Size of the color preview square in pixels (range: 8-32)

yivcolor.appearance.previewBorder.markdownDescription: Show a thin border around color previews to make them visible on matching backgrounds

enumDescriptions: Show color preview before the color code
Show color preview after the color code
yivcolor.appearance.previewPosition.description: Position of the color preview relative to the color code

yivcolor.colorFormats.description: Color formats to detect and display previews for
yivcolor.colorFormats.markdownDescription:
**Color formats** to detect and display previews for:
- HEX: `#FFFFFF`
- RGB: `rgb(255, 255, 255)`
- RGBA: `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)`
- HSL: `hsl(360, 100%, 100%)`
- HSV/HSB: Color models based on hue, saturation, and value/brightness
- CMYK: `cmyk(0%, 100%, 100%, 0%)`
- LAB, LCH, YUV, YCBCR: Additional color spaces
- NAMED: CSS color names like `red`, `blue`, `coral`, etc.

items.patternErrorMessage: File extensions should not include a dot, e.g. 'py' instead of 'py'

yivcolor.supportedFileTypes.description: List of file extensions to enable color decorations
yivcolor.supportedFileTypes.markdownDescription:
**File extensions** to enable color decorations

- Enter extensions without the dot (e.g., `js` instead of `.js`)
- One extension per line
- After adding new extensions, run the `YivColor: Refresh Settings` command

yivcolor.experimental.enableUntitledFile.description: Enable color previews in untitled (unsaved) files
yivcolor.experimental.enableUntitledFile.markdownDescription: Enable color previews in untitled (unsaved) files. This feature is experimental and may not work perfectly.

yivcolor.experimental.enableLogging.markdownDescription: Enable console logging for debugging purposes. Only enable if you're experiencing issues.
